title: A Bullet From The Past
description: 16yo schoolgirl Rebecca Wiseman has gone missing on her way home from School., Ex- Detective Inspector Jack Mitchell, now working as a Consulting Detective, has been hired by Rebeccaâ€™s Mother to find her daughter.Jack soon finds himself drawn into the violent world of a serial killer. As the number of bodies starts to mount, Jack has to put his own life on the line if he is to save the girl and unmask the killer.
author: Alan  Hodge
